title: Next Unicorns: Miso Robotics’ Mike Bell, $3 an hour fry cooks  + MorningBrew’s Dan Toomey on TikTok | E1276
description: Jason chats with Miso Robotics CEO Mike Bell (1:07), about automating food preparation, filling the labor gap, the consequences of robots, growing with crowdfunding and more. Then, TWIST Producer Rachel Braun interviews Dan Toomey about the strategies he uses to run the Morning Brew TikTok account.
